channel.title: Node.js on bnm 3000
channel.description: Recent content in Node.js on bnm 3000

item.title: Var, Let, Const and the 'commonly' expected behaviour
item.description: Javascript quirks and idiosyncracies. Or why learning a new programming language is hard when coming in with implicit assumptions from other languages

item.title: Logging with trace IDs in Node.js - pino, express and cls-hooked
item.description: A neat way to add tracing or transaction ids for each request-response cycle with as little modification to the rest of the code as possible
